pages.text: The ritual of $(marked)Binding$() uses greater demonic power to cross the soul of the caster and an animal they hold dear, making it a $(marked)familiar$(). The animal the Ritual is applied to is defined via $(item)Taglock$().$(br)Do note that not everything can be bound as a familiar; possible familiars are usually mentioned in this book.
Binding a familiar is a greater step and comes with several benefits depending on the animal chosen.$(br)$(o)Entries for all possible familiars in this book have been expanded$().
Familiars are far tougher than the average animal, but you should try to keep them safe anyways.$(br)Familiars can be noticed from the slight magic particles emitting from them.
A Ritual of $(marked)Severing$() can be cast, should you wish to part ways with your familiar.
